# isVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the receiver is displayed; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Setting properties

- **delegate**: The receiver’s delegate or `nil` if it doesn’t have a delegate.
- **title**: The string that appears in the receiver’s title bar.
- **actionSheetStyle**: The receiver’s presentation style.
